Room.Name: Lankshire Parkway
Room.ShortDescription: You are traveling along Lankshire Parkway, east of the Great Outdoorsman.
Room.LongDescription: The Great Outdoorsman is a small shop located on the west side of the road in a small shopping complex. The small shop specializes in unique hunting and sporting equipment. On the east side of the road, you can see Deni's World of Spices, which caters to fancy spices and herbs which might even be useable as magical components.
